person.persName: Charles L. Bradley (Kalamazoo, Michigan, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Kalamazoo, Michigan, farmer and soldier. Native of Ireland. Son of Andrew Bradley and Elizabeth Bradley. Farmer in Kalamazoo, Michigan, in 1860. Served in the 25th Michigan Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as sergeant from September 11, 1862, to October 10, 1863. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery Regiment (U.S.A.) from October 10, 1863, to November 14, 1864.
